Navbar and Footer templates (Pug)

You can easily switch between differen pre-built Navbar and Footer variants using Pug templates.

Navbar

Here is how to change Navbar and Page title variant inside any page template:

And this is the list of available templates:

  • navbar-solid
  • navbar-solid-shadow
  • navbar-floating-light
  • navbar-floating-dark
  • navbar-shop
  • navbar-dashboard
  • navbar-index
Footer

Here is how to change Footer variant inside any page template:

And this is the list of available templates:

  • footer-default
  • footer-simple
  • footer-shop
  • footer-blog
